channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Microsoft blogs

item.title: Azure WAF Tuning for Entra External ID
item.description: Introduction This blog is the second part of a series on tuning Azure Web Application Firewall (WAF) for Entra External ID/Azure Active Directory (AD) and serves as a follow-up to the earlier blog on Azure WAF Tuning with AD B2C Applications. With the introduction of Microsoft Entra External ID in 2024, some customers may experience similar challenges to those faced with Azure AD B2C, particularly around false positives generated by Azure WAF. This blog aims to provide guidance on how to best tune Azure WAF to handle traffic from Entra External ID, ensuring a seamless and secure experience for...
